db.description:
A quiet oasis in the heart of District 1 Teaspoon is a relaxing place to work and perfect your beverage making abilities. Teaspoons offer gourmet teas, excellent coffees and desserts. As a barista with Teaspoon you will have the ability to create and make great coffee, tea and juices/smoothies.

The role would be highly suitable to students or hospitality professionals looking for a professional & fun international working environment. Working hours are flexible and we are open to full time or part time staff.
db.requirement:
We’re looking for experienced baristas to work at our coffee and tearoom in District 1 Ho Chi Minh City.
What we’re looking for:
- A passion for tea and coffee and experience in hospitality
- Creativity, new and fresh ideas for beverages and desserts
- Friendly personality
- Commitment to customer service
- English language ability
db.benefit:
- training and progression opportunities
- competitive salary
- relaxed working environment
- flexible hours
